title: Uncle Si Has the Wildest Late-Night Habit
description:
Martin reveals one of Si's hilarious late-night habits. Godwin is scarred by two days without power. Si claims his body spray is a woman magnet, but there's another reason his wife, Christine, loves it so much. Martin soaks up fan advice on raising twins. Si remembers discovering something truly unfortunate while eating turtle soup. And John-David digs into the mailbag to give advice to a guy thinking of getting married before he graduates college.
-
